Sentencas: Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) perovskite-type oxide is currently one of the most promising materials for applications in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), protonic ceramic fuel cells (PCFCs), oxygen separation membranes, and catalytic membranes for methane conversion.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: BSCF powder synthesis has received considerable attention and new synthesis methods have been proposed to obtain nanoscale powders with high chemical homogeneity.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: In this study, BSCF perovskite powder has been successfully prepared by microwave assisted combustion in aqueous solution.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: The synthesized powder was characterized by DSC, BET, XRD, and SEM.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: BSCF powder presented phase homogeneity, high specific surface area (9.93 g/m(2)) and nanometric crystallite size (23nm).
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: The microwave sintering has been conducted in different conditions of dwell time and temperature.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: The influence of the temperature and the dwell time on microstructure was evaluated by optical microscopy.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: The results showed that microwave sintering could achieve the same densification compared to conventional sintering with only 10% of processing time.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite

Sentencas: This shorter processing time has resulted in a reduction of grain size of up to 46.5%, compared to conventional sintering.
Titulo: Microwave Assisted Synthesis and Sintering of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ Perovskite
